title: Cedar House Candles
dis: A small full stack ecommerce website that is performance optimize, can scale up, single page website, secure, and easy for the client to maintain without developer help. The app was deployed on Heroku and Atlas MongoDB. It uses the PayPal API for payment processing
tech: JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, React, Material UI, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, passport.js, axios

title: Crush it!
dis: Crush It! is a personal workout tracking Full Stack application that will allow the user to setup an account, create a workout routine by selecting from a range of exercises, and track your progress compared to previous sessions. The app was deployed on Heroku.
tech: JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Node.js, Express, Sequelize, Handlebars

title: Food Group
dis: The Front-End application searches for a recipe and displays stores nearby using 2 APIs Edamam, and Google Places.
tech: JavaScript, JQuery, HTMLnpm run deplo5, CSS3, Materialize

title: MVC Tech Blog
dis: CMS-style blog site similar to a Wordpress site, where developers can publish their blog posts and comment on other developersâ€™ posts as well.
tech: HTML5, CSS3, Node.js, Express, Sequelize, Handlebars

title: Work Day Scheduler
dis: The application allows a user to save events for each hour of the day using moment.js.

title: Weather Dashboard
dis: The application retrieves the weather for the current day and a five day forecast and keeps a history of searches using moment.js and Openweathermap API.
